backend/main.mo: Defines actor data types for moods, analytics, chat, user profiles, market metadata, pricing, and AI interactions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of key frontend source files including components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS with theme variables and light/dark mode definitions.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point injecting the root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST.md: Smoke test instructions for verifying login flows, navigation, and startup fallback behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing auth state, routing, profile setup, session tracking, and conditional header/login rendering.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an admin-only access restriction message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserDrilldo: Empty placeholder component for detailed admin user data.
Empty placeholder component for admin mood history displays.
frontend/src/components/AIChat.tsx: Interactive AI chat component that manages session creation, message sending, and transcript display with auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Admin analytics view showing user stats, mood data, and detailed user records with loading states and access control.
frontend/src/components/AnonymousLogin.t: Login screen offering Internet Identity or guest access with terms agreement and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/AppMarketSetting: Admin panel to view and edit app market metadata, pricing, and analytics with save actions and validation.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the SafeSpace logo in configurable sizes with optional wordmark.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoom.tsx: Chat room interface supporting room selection, joining, message retrieval, sending, and room creation.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatRoomDi: Dialog component that collects a room name and topic and submits a create-room mutation with loading and validation states.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard showing navigation cards and a weekly mood summary using data from chat rooms, private threads, and mood chart queries.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright info and a referral link with dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, navigation placeholders, user actions, and a mobile menu tied to identity and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/MoodHistory.tsx: Displays a user's mood history list with timestamps and scores, using a query and loading states.
frontend/src/components/MoodTracker.tsx: Mood submission form allowing mood selection and optional notes, saving entries via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/PresentationView: Admin-only viewer that loads a PDF via query, supports downloading, and shows loading and fallback states.
frontend/src/components/PrivateChat.tsx: Renders private chat UI, listing threads, messages, and sending new messages using query hooks and identity data.
frontend/src/components/StartPrivateChat: Dialog for creating a new private thread by entering a principal ID, with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorStat: Displays a startup error screen with details and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/StartupTimeoutFa: Shows a timeout fallback screen with reload and reset options when startup is slow.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodInsigh: Displays weekly mood insights fetched from the backend, handling loading, guest mode, and detailed summaries.
frontend/src/hooks/guestAuthStore.ts: Implements a guest session store with subscribe, create, load/save to storage, and clear functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActivityLogging.ts: Provides helper functions to log login, navigation, and interactions for users or guests via mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Checks admin status on startup and logs when a non-admin authenticated user is detected.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestAuth.ts: Hook for managing guest sessions using guestAuthStore, exposing creation, clearing, and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including login flow, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, covering admin checks, user profiles, mood entries, and related data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionTracking.ts: Tracks guest session activity and periodically logs interaction duration, including unload events.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining SafeSpace theme colors, dark mode, and animated aurora background effects.
frontend/src/lib/adminMoodAnalytics.ts: Utility functions for mood analytics, including emoji/color mapping and computing daily counts and weekly averages.
frontend/src/lib/ai/constraints.ts: Validates AI responses to block diagnostic or therapeutic claims.
frontend/src/lib/ai/generator.ts: Empty placeholder for AI response generation logic.
frontend/src/lib/ai/routing.ts: Selects conversational stage based on message content and session context.
frontend/src/lib/ai/sessionContext.ts: Manages loading, saving, initializing, and clearing AI session context in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templates.ts: Defines response templates per conversation stage and helper to fetch a random template.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templateUtils.ts: Adapts response templates by replacing placeholders using simple emotion detection.
frontend/src/lib/ai/types.ts: Defines types for conversation stages and session context.
frontend/src/lib/appStorage.ts: Clears SafeSpace-specific localStorage and sessionStorage keys.
frontend/src/lib/avatar.ts: Generates user initials from a name string.
frontend/src/lib/linearRegression.ts: Implements simple linear regression with slope, intercept, and predict function.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/emotionDetect: Detects basic emotions from text using keyword matching.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/engagement.ts: Computes an engagement score from 0–100 by scaling exchange count against a 20‑exchange maximum.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/nudges.ts: Provides random supportive nudge messages and logic to determine when to show a nudge based on time and exchanges.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/quickPills.ts: Defines a default list of quick-select emotional statements for user prompts.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/sessionUX.ts: Initializes, loads, saves, and clears MindfulAI session state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/mindfulai/types.ts: Declares EmotionData and MindfulAIState interfaces for emotion tracking and session state.
frontend/src/lib/moodErrors.ts: Defines MoodError types and classifies errors into permission, availability, or unknown.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Converts between nanoseconds and Date objects and formats timestamps, dates, and times.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/weeklySummaryText.ts: Generates mood labels and insight text based on average mood scores.
frontend/src/lib/weekUtils.ts: Provides helpers for calculating week start/end, listing week days, and checking if a date is in the current week.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Re-exports backend types and defines frontend ChatRoom and PrivateThread interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, and content paths for SafeSpace UI.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, features, and design notes for the SafeSpace UI.
